title: 148864347.would You Share It With A Friend
excerpt: It turns out that Google won't rank your content if your friends don't think it's worth sharing.

children.text: It turns out that Google won't
if your friends don't think it's worth sharing.
But if it’s clear, original, relevant, and interesting, they just might.
Alas, asking if you’d share your content with your colleages, or recommend it to a friend, is as good a benchmark as any in evaluating whether it’s worth publishing.
